values: The Depth of Christ's Love: Its Lavish BenefitsThe Depth of Christ's Love: Its Lavish Benefits

God might have rescued us, sacrificed for
      us, forgiven us, and not gone any further. But instead he took us into his family.
      God might have rescued us, sacrificed for
    us, forgiven us, and not gone any further. But instead he took us into his family.
